content: what a cute strawberry scrubber sparkle yarn is perfect to make scrubbies that fit in your hand and are easy to wash 1 easy to find yarn scrubby sparkle yarn 2 easy to read crochet pattern 3 fast to crochet 4 great gift item create a bundle with the strawberry dishcloth 5 coordinating strawberry dishcloth that is found here in my shop https //www etsy com/listing/1776278522/3d-strawberry-dishcloth-crochet-pattern 6 you will also find a lemon and orange dishcloth/scrubby set in my shop how fun it would be to have this sweet scrubby in your kitchen this type of yarn is wonderful as it really does help scrub the grime away you can easily wash your scrubby by throwing it in the dishwasher or washing machine what a win cleaning in the kitchen will be so much fun you might even find the kiddos will jump in to help you along when they can scrub with this strawberry scrubber this pattern is protected by copyright©krissysoverthemountaincrochet 2022 do not distribute alter or share this pattern in any shape or form you have my permission to sell the product you make using my pattern no mass production is allowed
